type_name_repTerm_type.description: Type names must end with the representation term 'Type'.

type_name_inconsistent_codeType.description: Code types should correspond to code simple types
type_name_inconsistent_codeType.validExample: HairCodeType is a valid name with base type HairCodeSimpleType.
type_name_inconsistent_codeType.invalidExample: HairCodeType is not a recommended name with base type EyeColorCodeSimpleType.
